full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM RIM DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG GI DMIGS RNAM 'GA' ZHIG GSAL BAR BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES LAM RIM DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG GI DMIGS RNAM 'GA' ZHIG GSAL BAR BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, @005B RAB 'BYAMS GZHUNG LUGS LA MKHYEN RGYA YANGS PA'I DKA' BCU YE SHES RGYA MTSO NAS LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SNYAN RGYUD KYI MNGA' BDAG DRIN CAN BLA MA RNAM GNYIS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
